animeTitle: Meet in Rebirth: An Exclusive For You and Me S2
otherNames: 重生相逢：给你我的独家宠溺
synopsis:
Reborn back to the age of seventeen, Yun thinks about vowing not to be bullied anymore, she beats a scumbag to high-profile marriage,
But he was forced to accept a man with leg problems, Yun thinks about being laughed at and ridiculed by others.
But when a man held her in his palm, others humiliated her and returned it ten times, and others deceived her a hundred times.
One day, Yun thought about it and was shocked: "Can you walk?" The man looked innocent: "I never said that I can't walk."
